title: Rare Bird Discovered!
description: A Common Oriole species had the privilege of basking in the limelight for over a minute as we captured this unexpected sighting on camera during our visit.

title: Learning from Taha Basrai, Sustainability Director of BugBoom
description: Taha shares eye-opening statistics about food waste in Singapore and gives us a tour of BugBoom's office and facilities.

title: Learning from Ivan Ong, COO of BugBoom
description: Ivan walks us through the various stages of development, explaining how food waste is converted into high-quality fertilisers through bioconversion.

title: Learning from Ivan Ong, COO of BugBoom — Part 2
description: Ivan continues his in-depth explanation of the end-to-end process behind converting food waste into high-quality organic fertilisers at scale.

title: Feeding the Black Soldier Fly!
description: Students received hands-on experience learning how to properly feed black soldier fly larvae — a key step in the composting and bioconversion cycle.

title: Analysing the Larvae and Fertiliser Produced
description: A close-up look at the black soldier fly larvae, the fertilisers they produce, and the final packaging — showcasing BugBoom's end-to-end bioconversion process.
